Good Comments: Awesome liberal translations! Bad encoding with too much filters however.
It's been a year since their last release. Quite sad since they have the best quality all-around.
Ridiculously slow that's beyond reasonable. It's one thing to take your time to sub. It's another thing to disregard it entirely.
Bad Comments: Their translations are highly accurate, and what's more, Wild Bunch provides the only viable option for Digimon Tamers subs now that Positron Cannon has removed his subs. I look forward to Wild Bunch's future Tamers releases.

Good Comments: The Wild Bunch offers best translation and video quality for this movie.
Bad Comments: Great job, great quality episode and subs.

Good Comments: They always provide excellent quality, translations, and of course AVIs.
They do a great job and release very fast
Great work. Both subs and video quality are great.
Bad Comments: Quick subs that are easy to read.
